confirm.header: Open {{ name }} to confirm the transaction.

transactionSent.text: Your transaction will be processed in a few seconds.

transactionCanceled.text: There will be no changes to your account.

mobileUniversalModal.openWalletOnTelegramOrSelect: Use Wallet in Telegram or choose other application

mobileConnectionModal.scanQR: Scan the QR code below with your phone’s or {{ name }}’s camera
mobileConnectionModal.missingFeatures: Please update {{ name }}, your version does not support required features for this dApp
mobileConnectionModal.wrongNetwork: Connected wallet is on a different network. Please switch network in {{ name }} and try again
mobileConnectionModal.notSupportedWallet: {{ name }} doesn’t support the requested action. Please connect another wallet that supports it

desktopConnectionModal.scanQR: Scan the QR code below with your phone’s or {{ name }}’s camera
desktopConnectionModal.dontHaveExtension: Seems you don't have installed {{ name }} browser extension
desktopConnectionModal.missingFeatures: Please update {{ name }}, your version does not support required features for this dApp
desktopConnectionModal.wrongNetwork: Connected wallet is on a different network. Please switch network in {{ name }} and try again
desktopConnectionModal.notSupportedWallet: {{ name }} doesn’t support the requested action. Please connect another wallet that supports it
desktopConnectionModal.openWalletOnTelegram: Connect Wallet in Telegram on desktop

infoModal.walletProtects: A wallet protects and manages your digital assets including TON, tokens and collectables.
infoModal.manageIdentity: Manage your digital identity and access decentralized applications with ease. Maintain control over your data and engage securely in the blockchain ecosystem.
infoModal.easilySend: Easily send, receive, monitor your cryptocurrencies. Streamline your operations with decentralized applications.

step1.title: Find your current recovery phrase
step1.text: Open your wallet settings and locate the recovery phrase

step2.title: Copy your recovery phrase
step2.text: Write it down or copy it to a safe place

step3.title: Restore in a supported wallet
step3.text: Enter the recovery phrase to access your wallet

allWallets.walletsBelowNotSupported: The wallets below don’t support all features of the connected service. You can use your recovery phrase in one of the supported wallets above.

wallet.title: {{ name }} doesn’t support the requested action
wallet.description: Install a supported wallet from the list below, restore it with your recovery phrase, then connect it and try again.
wallet.info: Learn how to restore your wallet

version.description: Your current version of {{ name }} or wallet contract type doesn't support the required features. Please update it to continue.

disconnect.title: Confirm Disconnect
disconnect.description: You will be disconnected from your current wallet and redirected to connect {{ name }}.

confirmTransaction.text: It will only take a moment.

signData.text: It will only take a moment.
